workers.convert.pdf package¶

Submodules¶

workers.convert.pdf.jpg_to_pdf module¶

workers.convert.pdf.jpg_to_pdf.convert_jpg_to_pdf(source_file, target_file)[source]¶
workers.convert.pdf.jpg_to_pdf.pdf_merge(file_paths, output_path)[source]¶

Create a single pdf from multiple ones merged together :param generator file_paths: list of paths to the pdf files to be merged in order :param str output_path: path for the generated pdf file

workers.convert.pdf.pdf module¶

workers.convert.pdf.pdf.cut_pdf(files, source, target)[source]¶

Make cuts out of multiple pdf files :param list files: List of Dictionaries with keys ‘file’ and ‘range’.

Lists the different Files that need to be cut.
Parameters:
  • source (string) – The working directory where we find the different files to be cut
  • target (string) – The directory where the created files go
